DOC.brief_title: Bone Metabolism Adjacent Hip Prosthetic Surfaces . A Clinical F-PET/CT Study
DOC.detailed_description: A clinical study 32 patient , age 50-69 year , healthy unless osteoarthritis one hip , randomize two group ( 16 ) plus reference group 32 patient´s contralateral healthy hip . Intervention surgery total hip arthroplasty . The four study endoprosthetic component : - Cemented Exeter stem ( Stryker Warsaw , USA ) ceramic 32 mm head Palacose cement gentamycin , apply 3 : rd generation cementation technique . - Uncemented Lubinus SP-CL stem ( Waldemar Link , Hamburg , Germany ) ceramic 32 mm head . - Uncemented Delta PF cup ( Limacorporate spa , Udine , Italy ) . - Uncemented fibrous metal Delta TT cup ( Limacorporate spa , Udine , Italy ) . Both cup cross link Ultra-high-molecular-weight polyethylene ( UHWMP ) . Clinical score , radiography uptake Fluoride tracer analyze .
